example.eg: Only allowed items, as listed in the attached document, may be brought into the examination.
You must answer within the allowed time.
Will your parents allow you to go to the dance?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同意, 允许, 许可

example.eg: Smoking is allowed, but only on the balcony.
example.egtrans: 可以抽烟，不过只能在阳台上。

example.eg: You should allow two hours for travel to the airport.
example.egtrans: 你得为去机场预留两个小时的时间。

example.eg: I will allow that this time I am wrong.
The new tramline will allow residents of this neighbourhood to reach the city centre in just ten minutes.
example.egtrans: 新铺设的电车轨道将使这个社区的住户能够在十分钟内到达市中心。

example.eg: We must make room to allow for expansion.
example.egtrans: 我们必须为扩建预留空间。

example.eg: The judge may allow leave to appeal the sentence.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 允许, 授予, 同意

example.eg: You may be allowed travelling expenses.
By not applying the handbrake, he allowed the car to roll down the hill.
The law allows that there may be exemptions.
If you do not have your passport, you will not be allowed to enter the country.  Once they had finished their exams, the students were allowed to leave.
example.egtrans: 如果你没有带护照，你将无法进入该国。

example.eg: Dogs are not allowed in the park.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不允许的, 不准许的
